name: Combinations Produced by n Coin Flips
description:
We all know what happens when we flip a coin. We get either heads, or tails. But what happens when we flip 2 coins? Now there are 2^2 possible combinations. 3 produces 2^3 combinations.

In general, n coin flips produces 2^n possible scenarios.

Your task will be to generate all the possible combinations and return them.

Good luck.

Limits: 0 <= n <= 10
